#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long int ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    ll T,N,M;
    scanf("%llu",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%llu%llu",&N,&M);
        M--;
        printf("%llu\n",((M+N/2)%N)+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
